page.title: 18RECREATIONAL FACILITIES
page.content: {Football. Most boys and some girls in Newbold play football at the{park,}where we have a pitch.We have a school team and we play other schools home or away.The ball is made from leather or plastic.The diameter of our ball is around 25cm. Newbold{Tug of War Team. Newbold Tug of War Team is{sponsored by Tardis Travel and the Cross Keys pub.There are eight men in each team.They raise money for{charities such as hospitals and old people homes.They pull at carnivals,fetes and shows and they have to be very strong to win. {Fishing. The ponds that are open to public for fishing in our area are Spring Wood pool,In Spring Wood the fish are mostly carp,tench,rudd and roach.
